title: Banning champions, lagging and waiting, (bugs?)
body:
[Alright Rito-senpai, here's my problem again in the "right"  sub-section.]

Ever since the new client and the new updates I've been having a big problem with being able to ban champions or locking in my own. Which painfully results in to me having to play the waiting game of 5 to 20 minutes because the system thinks I purposely dodged. Now I do admit my laptop is quite old and I need to replace it sooner rather than later, but before the new client this had never been a problem before.
So, rioters and rito-senpai, what do you think I need to do?
Just become addicted to bejeweled again and hope the gods send enough money so I can by myself a new desktop?
Or maybe there is a bug that needs to be fixed?

replies.body:
The recent patch did enable a new option to toggle performance on the client, in case your issue has been sluggish performance.  What exactly do you mean by big problem?  What happens if you also play on the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know!
